entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 8:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
